game.name: Substance 3D Painter 2025
game.genres: 애니메이션과 모델링, 디자인과 일러스트레이션, 게임 개발
game.shortDescription: Adobe Substance 3D Painter is the reference texturing app for 3D professionals and enthusiasts. From AAA Game Developers to Indies, from Feature Animation to Visual Effects studios, the industry uses Painter to bring their creations to life.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Adobe Substance 3D Painter is the reference texturing app for 3D professionals and enthusiasts. From AAA Game Developers to Indies, from Feature Animation to Visual Effects studios, the industry uses Painter to bring their creations to life.
